text: 'in aladhin taebudun min ghyr allah -ayha almshrkwn- hum mmlwkwn lirabihim kama 'anakum mmlwkwn lrbkm, fa'iina kuntum kama tazeumun sadiqin fi 'anaha tastahiqu min alebadt shyyana fadeuhum falyastajibuu lkm, fa'iina astajabuu lakum whssalu mtlwbkm, wa'illa tabayan 'anakum kadhibun muftarun ealaa allah 'aezam alfryt
